supplements.title: Association between Gushen Antai recipe intervention and plasma cytokines during early pregnancy following IVF-ET: a cohort study.
supplements.summary: Herbal medicine Gushen Antai recipe may improve early pregnancy success after IVF by positively influencing plasma cytokine levels.

supplements.title: Coriandrum sativum improves prognosis in clear cell renal cell carcinoma by targeting NEK6 to modulate the immune microenvironment: a predictive study based on network pharmacology and multi-omics analysis.
supplements.summary: Coriander compounds may improve clear cell renal cell carcinoma prognosis by targeting NEK6 and enhancing immune cell interactions in the tumor microenvironment.

supplements.title: Killing cancer takes guts: lessons learned from the manipulation of gut microbiome and immunotherapy for the future of urothelial carcinoma.
supplements.summary: In urothelial cancer, manipulating the gut microbiome through transplantation, probiotics, or diet may enhance immunotherapy effectiveness by boosting immune system response.

supplements.title: Association between Gushen Antai recipe intervention and plasma cytokines during early pregnancy following IVF-ET: a cohort study.
supplements.summary:
Here's a clear, concise summary sentence:

Herbal treatment Gushen Antai showed potential for improving early pregnancy outcomes in IVF patients by modulating immune system markers.

supplements.title: Coriandrum sativum improves prognosis in clear cell renal cell carcinoma by targeting NEK6 to modulate the immune microenvironment: a predictive study based on network pharmacology and multi-omics analysis.
supplements.summary: Coriander compounds target NEK6 in kidney cancer, potentially improving prognosis by influencing immune cell interactions and reducing tumor progression.

supplements.title: Natural compound 5,7,8-trimethoxyflavone mitigates radiation-induced lung injury by suppressing EMT and PI3K/Akt pathway.
supplements.summary: A natural compound called 5,7,8-trimethoxyflavone effectively reduces lung inflammation and fibrosis after radiation exposure by blocking key cellular signaling pathways.

supplements.title: Protective effect of Rosmarinus officinalis and its nanoparticles against chemobrain and neuroinflammation in rats: involvement of Wnt/β-catenin signaling and apoptotic machineries.
supplements.summary: Rosmarinus officinalis extract and nanoemulsion protected rats from oxaliplatin-induced chemobrain by reducing neuroinflammation and preserving cognitive function.

supplements.title: 3'-Hydroxypterostilbene suppresses prostate cancer via apoptosis and autophagy in vitro and potent tumor growth inhibition in vivo.
supplements.summary: 3'-Hydroxypterostilbene effectively suppresses prostate cancer by inducing cancer cell death through coordinated apoptosis and autophagy mechanisms.

supplements.title: Lactobacillus fermentum remodeled the lung microbiota by crosstalk with the gut and lungs and regulated the PI3K-AKT pathway to alleviate acute lung injury.
supplements.summary: Lactobacillus fermentum reduced lung inflammation and injury by rebalancing gut and lung microbiota and suppressing a key inflammatory pathway.

supplements.title: Killing cancer takes guts: lessons learned from the manipulation of gut microbiome and immunotherapy for the future of urothelial carcinoma.
supplements.summary:
Here's a concise summary sentence:

Specific gut microbiome compositions can enhance immune checkpoint inhibitor effectiveness in urothelial carcinoma by improving immune system response.

supplements.title: Association between Gushen Antai recipe intervention and plasma cytokines during early pregnancy following IVF-ET: a cohort study.
supplements.summary:
Here's a clear, concise summary sentence:

A traditional Chinese herbal medicine called Gushen Antai recipe may help improve pregnancy success rates for women undergoing IVF by modulating immune system responses.

supplements.summary: Coriander compounds target NEK6 in kidney cancer, potentially improving prognosis by modulating immune cell interactions and reducing tumor aggression.

supplements.summary: A natural compound 5,7,8-trimethoxyflavone reduces lung inflammation and fibrosis after radiation by blocking key cellular transformation pathways.

supplements.title: Protective effect of Rosmarinus officinalis and its nanoparticles against chemobrain and neuroinflammation in rats: involvement of Wnt/β-catenin signaling and apoptotic machineries.
supplements.summary: Rosemary extract and its nanoparticles protected rats from chemotherapy-induced cognitive decline by reducing neuroinflammation and preserving brain structure.

supplements.title: 3'-Hydroxypterostilbene suppresses prostate cancer via apoptosis and autophagy in vitro and potent tumor growth inhibition in vivo.
supplements.summary: 3'-Hydroxypterostilbene, a plant compound, effectively suppresses prostate cancer growth by triggering cell death through apoptosis and autophagy.

off_label.title: The inhibition of Il1β synthesis mediated by a novel pyridine-sulfonamide compound protects against the progression of metabolic dysfunction-associated steatotic liver disease.
off_label.summary: A novel compound AIK3a305 inhibits inflammatory protein IL1β, protecting liver cells and reducing progression of metabolic fatty liver disease in preclinical models.

off_label.title: GLP-1RAs versus metformin and Parkinson's risk in type 2 diabetes.
off_label.summary:
Here's a concise summary sentence:

GLP-1 receptor agonists showed potential neuroprotective benefits compared to metformin in reducing Parkinson's disease risk among type 2 diabetes patients.

off_label.title: Aspirin and Atorvastatin Augmentation Treatment in Patients with Major Affective Disorders and Inflammatory Dysregulation: A 12-Week Randomized Placebo-Controlled Study.
off_label.summary: Aspirin and atorvastatin may improve treatment outcomes for patients with major depressive disorder by reducing inflammation.

off_label.title: GLP-1RAs versus metformin and Parkinson's risk in type 2 diabetes.
off_label.summary: In patients with type 2 diabetes, GLP-1 receptor agonists showed potential neuroprotective effects against Parkinson's disease compared to metformin, warranting further research.

off_label.title: Aspirin and Atorvastatin Augmentation Treatment in Patients with Major Affective Disorders and Inflammatory Dysregulation: A 12-Week Randomized Placebo-Controlled Study.
off_label.summary: Aspirin and atorvastatin combined showed potential to improve treatment outcomes for patients with major affective disorders experiencing inflammatory dysregulation.

off_label.title: Targeting UCHL3 attenuates pathological markers in neuronal models of Huntington's disease.
off_label.summary: By reducing UCHL3 in Huntington's disease neuronal models, researchers decreased mutant protein aggregates and improved cellular stress resistance.

off_label.title: Metformin treatment and reduction of gastrointestinal cancer risk: A 2-sample Mendelian randomization study.
off_label.summary: Metformin shows potential to reduce risk of esophageal, gastric, and colorectal cancers, with growth differentiation factor 15 possibly playing a key role in colorectal cancer prevention.

off_label.title: Metformin treatment and reduction of gastrointestinal cancer risk: A 2-sample Mendelian randomization study.
off_label.summary: Metformin shows potential to reduce risk of esophageal, gastric, and colorectal cancers, with growth differentiation factor 15 (GDF15) potentially mediating the protective effect on colorectal cancer.

off_label.title: The Potential Impact of Histamine-2 Receptor Antagonists on Gynecologic Cancer Risk: A Population-Based Study of 23 Million Individuals.
off_label.summary:
Here's a concise summary sentence:

A large population study suggests histamine-2 receptor blockers may potentially reduce risk of gynecologic cancers like cervical, endometrial, and ovarian cancer.

off_label.title: Phenothiazine alleviates cisplatin-mediated acute kidney injury by inhibiting ferroptosis.
off_label.summary: Phenothiazine reduced kidney damage caused by cisplatin chemotherapy by blocking a type of cell death called ferroptosis in mouse models.

off_label.title: The Potential Impact of Histamine-2 Receptor Antagonists on Gynecologic Cancer Risk: A Population-Based Study of 23 Million Individuals.
off_label.summary: A population-based study suggests histamine-2 receptor antagonists might reduce the risk of gynecologic cancers by potentially offering protective or preventive effects.

off_label.title: Higher Doses of Oral Propranolol for Resistant Infantile Haemangio-mas.
off_label.summary: In resistant infantile haemangiomas, increasing propranolol dosage to 4 mg/kg/day can successfully treat 40% of cases with generally good tolerance.

off_label.title: Beyond the Gut: Thyroxine Malabsorption, Pharmacokinetics, and Delivery.
off_label.summary: Researchers explored levothyroxine absorption challenges in hypothyroidism, demonstrating alternative administration routes and testing methods for patients with complex absorption issues.

off_label.title: Higher Doses of Oral Propranolol for Resistant Infantile Haemangio-mas.
off_label.summary: In some cases of resistant infantile hemangiomas, increasing propranolol dosage above 3 mg/kg/day can successfully treat the condition, with 40% of patients responding.

off_label.title: Beyond the Gut: Thyroxine Malabsorption, Pharmacokinetics, and Delivery.
off_label.summary: Researchers explored levothyroxine absorption challenges in hypothyroidism, identifying novel testing protocols and alternative delivery methods like subcutaneous administration for patients with absorption difficulties.

biomarkers.title: A tri-scale in silico framework integrating pharmacovigilance and mechanistic modeling suggests tepotinib-associated acute kidney injury risk.
biomarkers.summary: A computational analysis of tepotinib for non-small cell lung cancer reveals potential acute kidney injury risk through multi-scale pharmacological investigation.

biomarkers.title: Toward next-generation therapeutic HPV vaccines: A review on expanding the antigen repertoire and an integrated bioinformatics selection framework.
biomarkers.summary:
Here's a concise summary sentence:

A comprehensive review proposes expanding HPV vaccine antigens beyond traditional targets to improve therapeutic effectiveness against HPV-associated cancers.

biomarkers.title: Development and validation of a predictive model for high-risk immune-related adverse events in gastric cancer patients treated with ICIs.
biomarkers.summary: A predictive model using blood markers and tumor characteristics can effectively identify high-risk immune-related adverse events in gastric cancer patients treated with immunotherapy.

biomarkers.title: Engineering nanobodies for drug delivery systems in Alzheimer's disease.
biomarkers.summary:
This is not a cancer research paper, but a research paper about Alzheimer's disease (AD) focusing on nanobody drug delivery strategies to cross the blood-brain barrier and target disease mechanisms.

Here's a clear 25-word summary:

Researchers engineer nanobodies to penetrate the brain barrier, potentially targeting Alzheimer's disease mechanisms and developing novel therapeutic approaches to reduce neurodegeneration.

biomarkers.title: Discovery of novel and highly potent XIAP-targeted peptide inhibitors using virtual screening.
biomarkers.summary: Researchers discovered a novel peptide that can effectively block a protein in lung cancer cells, potentially stopping tumor growth with minimal damage to healthy cells.

biomarkers.title: Clinical characteristics and whole exome sequencing in JAK2V617F- and CALR-unmutated essential thrombocythemia.
biomarkers.summary:

biomarkers.title: Elevated C-reactive protein to albumin ratio is a promising predictive biomarker for prognosis in patients with renal cell carcinoma.
biomarkers.summary: A higher C-reactive protein to albumin ratio could help predict survival and outcomes for patients with kidney cancer.

biomarkers.title: Force coordination distinguishes epithelial and mesenchymal modes of collective chemotaxis.
biomarkers.summary: Neural crest cells migrate differently in epithelial and mesenchymal states, with distinct supracellular force coordination and traction mechanisms during collective chemotaxis.

biomarkers.title: Deciphering the CAF-LCN2 axis: Key to overcoming anti-PD-L1 immunotherapy resistance in lung cancer.
biomarkers.summary: Cancer-associated fibroblasts in lung cancer promote therapy resistance by increasing LCN2 levels, and silencing LCN2 can improve immunotherapy effectiveness.

biomarkers.title: Network toxicology and Mendelian randomization reveal pathogenic factors of monoethyl phthalate-induced thyroid cancer.
biomarkers.summary: Network toxicology and genetic analysis identified five key genes that may explain how monoethyl phthalate exposure could contribute to thyroid cancer development.

biomarkers.title: Caspase-3 cleaves and activates the NADase SARM1 to promote apoptosis, linking two cell death mechanisms.
biomarkers.summary: Caspase-3 activates SARM1, a metabolic enzyme, during cell death in neuroblastoma and immune cells, potentially linking apoptosis and neurodegeneration.

biomarkers.title: Bioresponsive immunomodulator nanocomplex for selective immunoengineering in metastatic lymph nodes.
biomarkers.summary: A targeted nanocomplex selectively reprograms immune responses in metastatic lymph nodes, activating T cells and inhibiting tumor growth in mouse models.

biomarkers.title: Scaling the glassy dynamics of active particles: Tunable fragility and reentrance.
biomarkers.summary: Self-propelled particles in dense assemblies exhibit complex dynamic behaviors that could provide insights into biological processes like cancer progression.

biomarkers.title: Impact of renal and hepatic function on dihydropyrimidine dehydrogenase phenotype assessed by enzyme activity in peripheral blood mononuclear cells and uracilemia.
biomarkers.summary: A study found that kidney and liver problems can affect enzyme activity related to how the body processes certain cancer drugs, potentially impacting treatment effectiveness.

biomarkers.title: Discovery of a Covalent Small-Molecule eEF1A1 Inhibitor via Structure-Based Virtual Screening.
biomarkers.summary: A novel small molecule inhibitor (AKOS-04) targeting the protein eEF1A1 shows promising potential for pancreatic cancer treatment through covalent binding.

trials.title: Antibodies to watch in 2026.

trials.title: Clinical Implications of Aberrant Retinoblastoma Signaling in Patients With Grade 4 IDH-Mutant Astrocytoma: A Retrospective Cohort Study.
trials.summary: A disruption in retinoblastoma cell signaling is linked to shorter survival in patients with grade 4 IDH-mutant brain astrocytoma.

trials.title: Glutathione-activatable bola dendrimers mediate tumor-specific cytosolic siRNA delivery via dynamic thiol-disulfide exchange.
trials.summary: Glutathione-responsive bola dendrimers successfully delivered siRNA to lung cancer cells, inhibiting tumor growth with minimal side effects.

trials.summary: In gastric cancer patients, achieving textbook oncologic outcome (TOO) after surgery was associated with significantly better long-term survival rates.

trials.summary: Grade 4 IDH-mutant astrocytoma patients with disrupted retinoblastoma signaling showed significantly worse survival outcomes compared to patients with intact signaling.
